item.title: Cindy Cohn Is Leaving the EFF, but Not the Fight for Digital Rights
item.description: After 25 years at the Electronic Frontier Foundation, Cindy Cohn is stepping down as executive director. In a WIRED interview, she reflects on encryption, AI, and why she’s not ready to quit the battl
